searchBook.requestInfo:
@js:
let cacheKey = params.nativeTool.md5Encode(String(new Date().getTime()));let httpParams = {    'keys': params.keyWord,    'page': params.pageIndex,    'pageSize': 9,};let token = params.nativeTool.getCache('bbx_token');if (token != undefined)     config.httpHeaders['authorization'] = 'Bearer ' + token;config.httpHeaders['Content-Type'] = 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded';return {    'url': 'https://api.bbxcomic.com/api/v1/index/search-comic',    'cacheKey':cacheKey,    'POST': true,    'httpHeaders': config.httpHeaders,    'httpParams': httpParams,}
